Sentencas: Oxide coating on a ceramic substrate using a new method was attempted with a view to applying the method to the direct preparation of an oxide air electrode, La1-xSrxMnO3, in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: PREPARATION OF OXIDE FILM BY THE OXIDATION PLATING METHOD

Sentencas: As a first step, the oxide of manganese which is a component of an oxide electrode was plated on a yttria stabilized zirconia substrate by oxidizing the manganese hydroxide using hydrogen peroxide as an oxidant.
Titulo: PREPARATION OF OXIDE FILM BY THE OXIDATION PLATING METHOD

Sentencas: The film was firmly affixed to the substrate even before heat treatment, and SEM observation showed that it was relatively dense.
Titulo: PREPARATION OF OXIDE FILM BY THE OXIDATION PLATING METHOD

Sentencas: Also an attempt to deposit lanthanum strontium manganese oxide was made using this new method.
Titulo: PREPARATION OF OXIDE FILM BY THE OXIDATION PLATING METHOD
